productTitle: Skincare Prevention+ Daily Ultimate Protection SPF 50 Moisturizer, 3.2 Ounce
description:
This non-irritating, zinc oxide-based sunscreen offers SPF 50 protection against damaging UV rays. Its an ideal choice for sports, outdoor activities and high sun exposure, yet gentle enough for post-procedure skin. Apple stem cells fight the visible signs of aging and improve the appearance of wrinkles. An advanced skin protection complex features antioxidant plant extracts that help to combat the effects of skin damage. IMAGE Skincare is a clean and professional line backed by clinical results. Created by an esthetician, formulated by a plastic surgeon, IMAGE is dedicated to helping its customers Age Later. Prevention+ Daily Ultimate Protection SPF 50 Moisturizer


This high-level sunscreen is formulated with:
  • 9% Zinc oxide
  • 7.5% Octinoxate
  • 5% Octisalate
  • DNA Support Complex
  • Plant-derived stem cells
  • Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate
  • Thiotaine (ergothioneine)
Contains SPF 50 along with a blend of plant stem cells and potent antioxidants to protect skin against the effects of free radical damage caused by environmental exposure. Apply to cleansed skin every morning as a daily moisturizer and for ultimate protection. Re-apply every 2 hours when exposed to sun or as needed. Pro Tip - Use on advanced aging skin to provide the ultimate sun protection while plant-derived stem cell technology supports cell longevity. A sunscreen collection that acts like skincare. Prevention+ goes beyond traditional SPF. With the Prevention+ collection, Image Skincare combines broad-spectrum UVA/UVB sun protection with everyday age-defying skincare. Ultra-sheer and wearable, these daily moisturizers feature clean, skin-nurturing ingredients for skin wellness. A blend of plant stem cell extracts, vitamin C and marine botanicals nourishes the skin with every use. Potent antioxidants protect skin against the effects of environmental stress. Soothing mineral sunscreens create a physical barrier to protect against the damaging effects of the sun. Transparent zinc oxide has a smooth, weightless finish and is suitable for sensitive skin. Use Prevention+ every day to experience the benefits of broad-spectrum sun protection and skin-perfecting hydration.

productTitle: Color Care Authority Signature Blonde Restorative Filler, 6.7 fl. Oz.
description:
The process of bleaching hair can leave it fragile and porous. This restorative treatment prolongs the vibrancy of your signature blonde shade while filling in gaps in the cuticle and closing it to produce a smooth and youthful finish. Optimum levels of strength-building Keravis and soy protein dive deep into the hair shaft to reinforce, fortify and protect against breakage while our proprietary oil blend of Abyssinian, Safflower and Chamomile nourishes, smooths and protects. Add bounce and brilliance while returning to your best blonde. Fortifies and repairs fragile hair by filling in porous gaps in the cuticle caused by bleaching. Closes hairs cuticle to provide a smooth and youthful finish. Optimum levels of Keravis and soy significantly increases tensile strength and elasticity. Nourishes and smooths while protecting against breakage. Provides unsurpassed color and heat protection up to 450 Degree. ColorProof is a complete line of professional products designed exclusively for color-treated hair. These formulas combine the latest innovations in ingredient technology with best-in-class ingredients to create a new standard.
  • Advanced ColorLast System featuring Chromaveil, derived from corn, and Heliogenol, derived from sunflowers, help provide powerful UVA/UVB color protection.
  • Proprietary blend of 11 sulfate-free, salt-free surfactants derived from coconut and palm delivers gentle cleansing with 96% color retention.*
  • A superior blend of vegan, multiweight proteins derived from potatoes and soy provides strength and repair.
  • A powerful blend of rosemary, sage, shiitake mushroom, geranium and yarrow feeds hair essential nutrients, nourishes and restore youthful brilliance.
*Color retention after 10 washes using ColorProof Shampoo and Condition. Results may vary. Tested by UK Croda Industries in 2012.

productTitle: LaserComb
description:
The HairMax LaserComb delivers the energizing and nourishing effects of Laser PhotoTherapy to make hair look healthy and vibrant. Light is energy. Living cells thrive in light and your hair is no different. The end result is that the appearance of your hair will improve and you will feel good about your hair again. With two decades of clinical experience, the results seen with the laser used in the LaserComb are both encouraging and impressive. Direct experience shows that, unlike other treatments, men and women of all ages respond to the positive benefits of Laser PhotoTherapy. It is no surprise that satisfied users range in age from 18 to their late 80s. If you are concerned about your hair, the earlier you start using the HairMax LaserComb, the better. There's nothing more detrimental to a person's appearance than thin, lifeless hair. And the longer you wait to do something about it, the less chance there is of reversing the problem. That's where HairMax steps in to help.


The HairMax LaserComb is a safe, simple way to a fuller head of thick, luxurious-looking hair.
With more than 90% of all LaserComb users achieving satisfaction with their results, this device is a safe, simple way to a fuller head of thick, luxurious-looking hair. It is a proven fact that skin cells "like" light. Your hair is no different. Both men and women of all ages can benefit from laser light therapy provided by the LaserComb. Although individual results may vary, you should notice early improvements to the general appearance of your hair within the first eight to 16 weeks. These improvements should include shinier and thicker looking hair. In general, studies have shown that about 45% of LaserComb users see these results in as little as eight weeks of treatment. Another 45% realize benefits from use within eight to 16 weeks. A small group of users take longer and may not experience noticeable results before 16 weeks of use. Even Time Magazine spotted the benefits of LaserComb, featuring the invention in the December 4, 2000, "Inventions of the Year" issue. Over the course of several more months, you may notice your hair gradually become fuller, stronger, and denser looking. Over time, all users -- both men and women -- usually notice progressively increasing benefits as they continue to use the LaserComb. Conversely, once the usage stops, the appearance of the hair does gradually regress back to its original state. Like brushing your teeth to maintain healthy teeth and gums, regular LaserComb usage is recommend to keep your hair looking its best. As few as three times a week for 10 to 15 minutes a session is sufficient to see results.


HairMax encourages the glide method for the best results.
How to use the LaserComb
The LaserComb has been designed with both comfort and convenience in mind. To turn on the LaserComb, press the power button and then the laser button on the front of the unit. Next, place the LaserComb flat on your head using the two rows of teeth. Rather than constantly moving the device through your hair (as you would with a regular brush or comb), you should use a glide method by placing the LaserComb on a specific spot on your head and gently gliding it back about 0.5-inches each time the audible four-second beep occurs. Move from the front of your hairline to the back of your head, then repeat the process moving in the opposite direction. The glide method is the best way to ensure that the LaserComb will be as effective as possible. In addition to being very easy to operate, this device is also a relaxing and enjoyable product to use. There are no sprays, topical ointments, or powders to worry about, and it can be used in the comfort of your own home at your own convenience. Proven Technology: Laser PhotoTherapy
For many years leading hair clinics and salons in Europe, Asia and around the world have been using Laser PhotoTherapy -- a form of laser technology also referred to as Low Level Laser Therapy -- to improve the appearance of thinning hair. Over and over individuals suffering from thin, lifeless hair have achieved great results with this form of therapy, but until just recently Laser PhotoTherapy was only available through exclusive hair clinics. These clinics rely on large, fixed laser devices, and, to be effective, a patient must attend many regularly scheduled, expensive in-office therapy sessions. With the HairMax LaserComb, Lexington International has miniaturized the internationally-acclaimed Laser PhotoTherapy technology. Now, with the LaserComb, it is possible to receive this effective hair care treatment in the comfort and privacy of your home, office, or hotel, and at a fraction of the cost charged by hair clinics. The LaserComb utilizes the scientific principle of Photo-Biostimulation that progressively improves the appearance of your hair over time. By harnessing the energizing and nourishing effects of Laser PhotoTherapy, HairMax makes your hair look healthy and vibrant. Remember, living cells thrive in light and your hair is no different. The Laser PhotoTherapy used in the LaserComb complies with USA laser product safety standards. The laser affects only your hair and you achieve benefits without any worrying side effects. Laser PhotoTherapy gives off no heat and is safe for consumers to use at home. Unlike the high powered lasers used in manufacturing, medical surgeries and science, Laser PhotoTherapy is a gentle, nourishing light therapy that has positive effects on hair. The HairMax LaserComb is safe to be used by itself or in conjunction with other treatments.


Hair before treatment with the LaserComb.

Results after the first weeks of treatment.

And results with continued treatment.

productTitle: Greyl Paris Shampooing Creme Moelle De Bambou, 7 Oz
description: Is your hair dry and hard to manage? Looking for a shampoo that can help? Look no farther, Shampooing Creme Moelle de Bambou (For long hair) from Leonor Greyl is the product for you! Although this product will work with any hair type, it is definitely intended to help out more with dried out hair that is particularly long. Don't be afraid to offer your hair amazing regeneration and nourishing properties so your dry, thick and/or long hair will gain brilliance, volume, and will improve in styling. Do not hesitate to try this product, we promise you are not going to regret it!. Ferula assa foetida root extract LEONOR GREYL is the brand specialist in hair treatments using only high grade natural ingredients  all environmentally safe. Sitting in his Parisian garden in 1997, Jean-Marie Greyl noticed that the roots of one of his bamboo plants were growing horizontally, sprawling across the neighboring plants. Taking a closer look, he realized just how hardy and fast-growing this plant is. He decided to extract its sap to add to a nourishing shampoo for repairing damaged lengths and ends. It became a must-have product for dry hair and it was the first shampoo to be created specifically for managing long hair. More than a mission statement, it is a guiding principle, initially chosen by Leonor and Jean-Marie Greyl and subsequently pursued with passion by their daughter Caroline. The brand came to be seen as a visionary pioneer in the field. Thanks to the powers of nature, Leonor Greyl emerged as a leading, exclusive haircare brand, a status it enjoys to this day. The family-run company's philosophy is based on meticulous and selective management of its sources of supply to treat clients around the world to premium, effective, innovative and natural ingredients that deliver exceptional results. Leonor Greyl has always chosen to work with Mother Nature's most precious secrets and gifts to care for, repair, enhance and perfect hair.

productTitle: Multi-Action Restorative Cream, 1.7 oz.
description:
Harnessing 35 years of skincare research, this breakthrough cream is formulated with pro-12 youth optimizing complex to initiate a cascade of revitalizing effects in skin, addressing the 12 visible signs of aging: fine lines, wrinkles, density, firmness, sagging, texture, dehydration, dullness, discoloration, clarity, resilience, enlarged pores. With patented nia-114 technology, the formula replenishes and strengthens the moisture barrier to diminish water loss and maintain hydration levels, optimizing skin performance to fortify against future aging. Bold science. No nonsense results. Thats smart beauty for smart women. Thats StriVectin.


Moisture retention is key to retaining the look of younger skin. As we age, multiple factors break down the water and moisture retaining skin barrier, leading to dehydration and dry, dull skin. Help maintain the skin barrier by always handling with care, avoiding harsh ingredients, not washing with hot water or over-exfoliating. Powered by the Pro-12 Youth Optimizing Complex, Restorative Cream contains a tri-peptide amino acid protein that visibly tones skin and promotes fitness health, shea butter to support elasticity and moisture and NIA-114, to strengthen the skin barrier and supercharge the performance of other ingredients. Restorative Cream targets the 12 key visible signs of aging: fine lines, wrinkles, density, firmness, sagging, texture, dehydration, dullness, discoloration, clarity, resilience and enlarged pores. Skin is more resilient to time, feeling renewed and appearing healthier and more youthful.


Target multiple signs of aging for maximum results with minimal. This capsule collection features ultra-modern textures and high impact, do-it-all formulas that make it easy to have great skin. Apply all over clean face, after the serum step, in the AM and PM. Every StriVectin formula is powered by NIA-114, an optimized, patented form of Niacin/Vitamin B3 clinically proven to strengthen the moisture barrier and supercharge the performance of other ingredients. A high-functioning skin barrier protects skin from damaging environmental aggressors, inhibits moisture loss and is the key to maintaining st strong, radiant, healthy-looking skin.

productTitle: ICELAND Arctic Elixir, 0.845 fl. oz.
description:
The Arctic Elixir is a treatment formulated with a peptide derived from plant stem cells that combats stress-induced signs of aging in as little as three weeks. This ground-breaking technology helps to induce DNA repair genes and stimulate cell energy to revitalize skin. Truly transformative, it has also been shown to diminish wrinkles and improve elasticity while helping to boost the synthesis of new collagen and reduce free radicals. Raspberry plant stem cells deliver powerful anti-inflammatory and antioxidant benefits that help reign in damage caused by stress. Stress has a special way of leaving its mark on even the most glowing complexions. Whether it's a life that's just too busy or environmental aggressors that just won't quit, skin reacts badly and begins to look irritated and exhausted, diminished and aged. Sodium Hyaluronate, derived from a natural barley extract, is a wrinkle filler that is deeply moisturizing and helps to restore skin's lipid barrier. It has been shown to significantly reduce wrinkle depth in 30 minutes and helps to restore skin's suppleness, elasticity and tone. Raspberry stem cells are a patented active derived from cultured raspberry cells with powerful antioxidant and DNA protection benefits. Offers immediate soothing and long-term protection for the skin. Specifically targets stress-induced inflammation and aging by reducing nitric oxide levels. Plant Peptide, also known as plant collagen, is derived from cultured plant stem cells and used to diminish wrinkles, improve elasticity, boost collagen production while helping protect and repair cell DNA. It has also been shown to reduce fine lines and wrinkles up to 25% in just three weeks.


What it is: A transformative vitamin C rich peel-off mask that supercharges stressed and depleted skin with an instant dose of deep hydration while locking in potent natural actives plus vital nutrients to replenish and reenergize in minutes. How to use: Squeeze the gel base (pouch 1) and treatment powder (pouch 2) into tray and mix with the spatula until combined to a paste. Using the spatula, spread a thick and even layer onto a dry, freshly cleansed face. Leave on for 20-25 minutes until the mask takes on a solid, rubbery texture, then peel off starting from the outside of your face. What it is: A full scale attack on fine lines and wrinkles. Hydro Cool Firming Eye Gels keep eyes looking well rested, while Hydro Cool Firming Face Gels smooth and erase smile lines and forehead furrows. How to use: Remove backing and apply gel side to forehead, around the mouth or under-eye area for 10 minutes. After treatment, gently peel away patch and dispose of. Use once a week or whenever you need a quick fix! What it is: Exfoliating peel pads to gently and effectively renew skin's surface. How to use: After cleansing, smooth a pad over entire face once daily or 3 to 5 times a week for sensitive skin.

description:
Nail lacquer is the original nail polish formula that reinvented quality nail color, your top choice if you enjoy updating your manicure weekly. productTitle: Cosmetics Base Perfect Liquid Foundation, Oil Free, Silicon Based With Vitamin A and E, High Pigment and Buildable for Medium Coverage, Airless Pump Bottle, 1 Fluid Ounce/30ml, Shade 1NB-BP
description:
Admittedly, youre still working on perfect behaviour 24/7, but you can tick off a pristine complexion thanks to Gorgeous Cosmetics Base Perfect Liquid Foundation. Great looking skin on tap? You heard right. Dosed with light-diffusing pigments and special silicones, Base Perfect Liquid Foundation delivers that flawless look we all crave by disguising imperfections and fine lines and giving skin a healthy, luminous glow. And hows this for multi-tasking? The formula also contains antioxidant Vitamins A and E, which not only nourish and sooth the skin but also protect it against free radical damage all while youre going about your business. Base Perfect Liquid Foundation boasts an oil-free, medium coverage formula that wont clog pores or leave an embarrassing oil slick come morning latte time. And it stays put. Yep, this foundation promises to stick with you until youre ready to put your feet up (finally) without going cakey, blotchy, or you know, just kind of blah on your skin Call off the search for your perfect match too because Base Perfect Liquid Foundation covers the spectrum of skin tones with fourteen different shades. And if all this perfection wasnt enough, Base Perfect Liquid Foundation contains high quality colour pigment so youll only need a little bit to get your skin looking, well, perfect. Gorgeous Cosmetics is a luxury Australian cosmetics brand. Our makeup collection includes high-performance foundations and powders, eye and lip products, premium Pro-quality brushes and reusable false lashes. Base Perfect is the perfect foundation for every skin. From dry & sensitive to extremely oily, our master formula is designed to suit all skin types and troubles. Dosed with light-diffusing pigments, Base Perfect Foundation delivers a flawless, photo ready finish with a buildable coverage. Base Perfect blends seamlessly to lock-in smart silicones without patching or caking. Enjoy smoother, more luminous skin & diffuse fine lines & pores with 1 pump! Special Silicones - Disguise the appearance of imperfections & fine lines, giving skin a healthy, luminous glow. Vitamin A - Improves collagen density & reduces the appearance of aging. Tones skin & provides elasticity to each fine line. Vitamin E - Protects from oxidant damage. Has anti-inflammatory & anti-aging properties. High in moisture, keeping skin smooth & hydrated.

productTitle: of California Aluminum Travel Shave Brush
description:
BENEFITS
Prep for a great shave on-the-go with our 100% natural badger hair shaving brush, an essential pre-shave tool that helps to lift facial hair and create lather. This travel shaving brush features an aluminum handle with a matte black anodized finish that doubles as the case. Special attention has been paid to ensure that the threads of each piece fit each other perfectly to guarantee their stability when in use. Plus, when packed away and not in use, the case allows the brush to breathe properly even when enclosed in the disassembled handle. Made in Germany.

INGREDIENTS
N/A
  Baxter of California's Aluminum Travel Shave Brush is made in Germany of 100% natural badger hair. It features a two piece aluminum handle with a matte anodized finish. 1. Cleanse facial skin. 2. Rinse the brush in warm water, shake off excess water, and apply Baxter Super Close Shave Formula to the top of the badger brush. 3. Work the cream into your beard, using oblique brush strokes. 4. For more lather, dip the tip of the brush in water and add more shave cream. Pure badger hair rests atop this practical travel brush, which features a two piece aluminum handle with an attractive matte anodized finish. Special attention has been paid to ensure that the threads of each piece fit each other perfectly to guarantee their stability when in use, while clever design allows the brush to dry properly even when enclosed in the disassembled handle. Second to the razor blade, the badger hair shave brush is the essential tool used to achieve the best shave possible. Badger hair has a great ability to retain water (which helps create a lather when mixed with a shave cream), improving the barrier between the razor and skin, and lifting facial hair to ensure a smoother shave with less irritation. Welcome to cutting-edge skincare created by Baxter Finley in 1965. It started with a single product: Super Shape, a mens skin conditioner that offered protection from the sun and sea. This gender-specific breakthrough was no gimmick. Suddenly guys got grooming. In the years since, Baxter of California pioneered a comprehensive range of products tailored to a mans needs. Years of research by our experts proves that all skin is not created equal. Our approach is science plus nature, built from the ground up in California. We may be old school in concept, but were high-tech in practice. Bottom line: Finleys dry skin began a revolution. Baxters legacy meets advanced research: This is the evolution of mens grooming. Shop the Baxter of California Store Shave after your shower or apply a hot wash cloth to your beard for approximately 30 seconds. The use of a badger hair brush will evenly disperse the cream and lift facial hair. Shave difficult areas last permitting the cream to soften the hair longer. Shave in the direction of the hair growth only. While this may not offer the closest shave, it does provide the least amount of irritation.
Super Close Shave Formula
After Shave Balm
Safety Razor
Shave 1.2.3. Kit Hydrating shave cream for men provides a protective cushion between the skin and razor, for a close shave without redness or irritation. Alcohol free post shave moisturizer for men. Includes Super Close Shave Formula, After Shave Balm, and "Best Badger" Shave Brush.

Radical Skincare Advance Peptide Antioxidant Solution is a targeted anti-aging serum that works morning and night to fight the 16 causes of aging. Whatever your age or skin type, this serum is the ultimate broad spectrum anti aging partner that will deliver Radical results. In a clinical study in just 60 days, 96.7% of the participants saw 44.56% improvement in firmness and 96.7% of the participants saw 135.34 % improvement in elasticity. 100% of participates said that skin felt softer and hydrated all day. Driven by the passion of the Edlich sisters and their father, Dr. Richard F. Edlich MD PhD, one of Americas leading plastic surgeons and skin healing specialists, Radical Skincare delivers more anti-oxidant potency than leading prestige brands, and maximum levels of anti-aging skincare ingredients. Our commitment is that every person loves their skin and their life. Radical Skincare speaks to those who know better and want more. More honesty, more potency, more performance. Potent anti-aging skincare with strong values. Empowering you and your skin. Radical results and nothing less. The Advanced Peptide Antioxidant Serum combines all the ingredients to fight the skin aging process and fight 16 causes of Aging. It includes 13 carefully selected and individually tested ingredients and 2 hexa peptides. It includes 9 powerful antioxidants. Its efficiency is reinforced by Trylacel proprietary technology.

No Animal testing. What Makes Radical So Special?
  • Enables the maximum concentration of actives for maximum delivery to the skin, and for all skin types

Fighting Free Radicals Damage and Aging with Antioxidants Antioxidants are the best defense against free radical damage and aging. The strongest antioxidants are found in natures dark night shade fruits like resveratrol, coffee berry, acai, grapeseed, red wine extract, pomegranate, and cranberry to name a few. Multiple antioxidants are required to fight the numerous types of free radicals. Using one or two antioxidants is simply not enough. Preventing the antioxidant breakdown during combining When antioxidants are combined with reparative ingredients in a cream they break down and lose their power, rendering them ineffective to protect your skin from this free radical assault and therefore daily deterioration continues aging your skin. Until now. More honesty, more potency Trylacel a radical breakthrough in suspension technology, keeps the antioxidant potency and performance in the cream to deliver maximum benefits and results quickly. productTitle: Erase – Full Size Body Duo – TruFirm Complex – Intensive Body Repair Treatment and Exfoliating Body Polish
description: The Exfoliating Body Polish & Intensive Body Repair Treatment are part of the Crepe Erase system. These products are specifically designed to improve the look of aging skin that may have a dry, crinkly, or crepe-paper-like appearance. They contain TruFirm, a proprietary blend of skin-restoring plant extracts that help promote healthy collagen and elastin. Together this body polish and body repair treatment nourishes and renews the look of your complexion by buffing away dead-skin cells and providing intense hydration, reviving aging skin. These products together leave your skin visibly smoother, firmer, and more radiant. Use Crepe Erase's Exfoliating Body Polish & Intensive Body Repair Treatment any time of year for youthful skin, but especially in the harsh winter months. Cold weather can dry out your skin, leaving it cracked, rough, chapped, and flaky. By using this body exfoliator followed by this body treatment, you can hydrate your skin and prevent excessive dryness, keeping skin softer, smoother, and younger looking. The Exfoliating Body Polish & Intensive Body Repair Treatments concentrated moisturizers are the perfect way to combat dry seasonal skin. To use, start with damp skin and apply a pearl-sized amount of Exfoliating Body Polish onto affected areas such as the neck, chest, arms, or legs. Massage in circular motions to help remove dead surface cells. Rinse with warm water and pat dry. Then apply a pearl-sized amount of the Intensive Body Repair Treatment onto affected areas such as the neck, chest, arms or legs daily. Massage in a circular upward motion for up to 1 minute or until fully absorbed. Use daily. Manufacturer 60-Day Product Exchange Guarantee: This item is eligible for a product exchange guarantee when purchased from an authorized seller. If for any reason you are dissatisfied or have an issue with your product, we will happily exchange your item for the same item, brand new, even if the bottle is empty. Please contact the manufacturer for more information. One exchange per customer. Crepe Erase is the #1 anti-aging body treatment system for dry, crepey skin based on 2017 IRI, NPD, and Crepe Erase sales data. We exist to help women of all ages feel confident in their skin.

Alternatively, OPI Matte Top Coat takes nails to a new dimension, offering a high-fashion matte finish to wear over any OPI shade.

productTitle: Double Edge Razor
description:
eShave Double Edge Razor is the ultimate traditional shaving tool made modern. Based on the latest head design, it combines precision engineering, manufacturing, and ergonomic handling. The three-piece, a standard fixed head with safety bar and the ring are made of nickel plated brass for a heavy head feel while the handle is made of hand turned lucite for a light and comfortable hold, giving this double edge razor the perfect balance. Once you combine eShave Double Edge Razor with the right blade for you, you'll experience a shave like never before -- super close. Available in three fashionable colors, blue, green and black you are sure to find one that fits your style. eShave DE Double Edge Razor - Blue With this simple believe, eShave was born. It all started in 1996 when Danielle Malka met with famous barbers in London. They picked her curiosity when talking with such enthusiasm about their clients shaving experience; nothing that compared with her husbands nor any man she knew. With them she captured the essence of wet shaving and developed the 3 steps of shaving program to bring the barbers experience home to every man and created Shave as a shaving solution to all men shaving issues. eShave is still today a unique modern brand that appeals to today men with signature scents, light textures, clean and high quality ingredients.


Shave after the shower or use a hot towel: The hot water loosens up pores and softens the hair for a closer shave. Lightly rub eShave Pre Shave Oil onto skin to provide protection and allow the razor to glide easily. Lather up a dab of Shaving Cream with a brush or your fingers to soften and raise the hair away from the skin for a closer shave. Shave with the grain using your eShave Razor. Forget pressure. Change blade often and let it glide over prepared skin in the direction of hair growth. For stubborn hair, reapply Shaving Cream and repeat shaving in a sideways motion using small strokes to prevent irritation. Around the neck area, where hair grows in different directions, run fingers along neck to feel and follow the pattern. Rinse and rub moistened eShave Alum Block against the skin to close the pores and cleanse the skin. Pat skin dry and apply eShave After Shave Soother for maximum comfort.

Infinite Shine is a 3-step system which provides up to 11 days of wear and gel-like shine. A uniquely bright brown due to subtle notes of pink. This versatile shade offers endless possibilities. productTitle: Thermal Spring Bath Salt Sachet Eucalyptus

Rattan wraps the mid section of the bottle and plays a key textural role in island living from shutters to seating. The gold collar pays homage to the sun. BeautyRx by Dr. Schultz evolved from the feedback of over 100,000 patient visits to Dr. Schultz's dermatology practice. BeautyRx offers a comprehensive skincare collection built around his industry-leading glycolic exfoliants. Our skin cells are supposed to renew every 28 days, but, as we age, this process slows down. Dead cells begin to accumulate on the surface of your skin, causing a rough, dull, and discolored appearance. But by exfoliating daily with a gentle glycolic exfoliant, you will actively remove and keep away the dulling dead cells, revealing the smoother, brighter, and younger-looking skin that you've had all along. Daily exfoliation not only makes your skin look younger, but it also does so much more: - Increases firmness and brightness of skin. - Improves makeup application and efficacy of skincare products. - Helps prevent and control acne breakouts. - Decreases appearance of pore size. - Helps remove unwanted brown discoloration. BeautyRx founder, Dr. Neal Schultz

productTitle: Infinite Shine Nail Polish, 0.5 Fl Oz
description:
Infinite Shine is a 3-step system which provides up to 11 days of wear and gel-like shine. This brown shade is truly brilliant. Going for this long-lasting bronze is the smartest choice you ever made. Made in the USA. Infinite Shine long-wear nail lacquer applies like a lacqur, removes like a lacquer, and shines until removed. Founded in 1981, OPI first established its roots in the professional nail industry, taking the brand to consumers with the launch of 30 groundbreaking Nail Lacquer shades in 1989. With its famous bottle, incredible colors, high-quality product and unique names, OPI revolutionized the nail care industry. In fact, some of these original shades Alpine Snow, OPI Red, Malaga Wine became so iconic, they are still sold today! For more than 25 years, OPI has offered users a 'message in a bottle,' creating a worldwide Culture of Color embracing color as a powerful tool for self-expression. Step 1: Prep your nails! Remove existing nail lacquer then trim and shape nails by filing in one direction only to prevent breakage! Apply cuticle oil, push back cuticles and remove hangnails. Finally, cleanse to remove oil. Step 2: Apply Infinite Shine ProStay Primer to anchor color and gloss. Step 3: Apply two coats of Infinite Shine color, using three strokes for each coat. Apply the first down the middle and then one on each side for complete coverage. Step 4: Apply Infinite Shine ProStay Gloss to activate the system, locking in shine. OPI Infinite Shine ProStay Primer and ProStay Gloss, when used with Infinite Shine color, offer real staying power with up to 11 days of wear. When applying all three steps, this state-of-the-art system yields glossier, shinier, longer-wearing results. The primer acts as an anchor to the nail for the rest of the system, while simultaneously preventing staining. The gloss contains initiators that activate the entire system when exposed to natural light, linking the color and gloss layers together and locking in shine.

A caring shower oil that transforms into a silky soft foam on contact with water. Leaves your skin feeling beautifully soft and hydrated, while helping you stay tanned for longer. Enriched with organic rice milk, a natural ingredient that nourishes the skin and leaves it silky soft, and cherry blossom, the Japanese symbol of purity. For centuries, the Japanese have celebrated the annual flowering of the Cherry Blossom, or Sakura. This marks an awakening of nature and symbolizes that beauty is momentary and life must be enjoyed. Inspired by this tradition, The Ritual of Sakura collection blends the sweetness of Cherry Blossom with nourishing Organic Rice Milk, to make each day feel like a new beginning.





The fragile blossoms of the sakura tree (Japanese cherry) is often described as spring snow by Japanese poets. For the Japanese cherry blossoms symbolize the rebirth of nature and purity since ancient times. The delicate fragrance is wonderfully relaxing. Throughout Asia, rice is a symbol of abundance, happiness and fertility. Formulated with the essence of rice milk your skin is left soft, supple with a healthy glow.

description: " Jack Black Bump Fix is a unique, oil-free solution to painful razor bumps and ingrown hairs. It also acts as a superior astringent for oily and acne-prone skin. Our PureScience formulas are free of synthetic fragrance, colorants, and parabens. Every product features certified organic ingredients and is cruelty free and dermatologist tested. For optimal results, apply Bump Fix to clean skin. Moisten a cotton pad and cover the entire affected area (face, neck, back) with a thin layer, one to three times daily. Do not rinse. Until skin acclimates to the treatment, begin with one application daily, at night; gradually increase usage to two or three times daily. To minimize the chance of irritation or stinging, wait 30 minutes after shaving to use this product. Apply before your post-shave gel, moisturizer, or sun protection.

productTitle: LONDON Nail Lacquer, Neutral  Brown Shades, Cuppa
description: butter LONDON lacquers are formulated to nourish and protect nails while offering the ultimate "wow" factor We believe in Rock & Roll. Great Britain. And fashion. We're obsessed with color, unbridled creativity and self-expression. Butter LONDON nail lacquers are recognized world-wide for their high-fashion color. From the start, our products are formulated to nourish and protect nails, offer the ultimate "wow" factor, and dedicated to clean beauty — and that is still true today. Benefits Quick-dry formulation contains calcium and vitamins E, A, C & Pro B5. High-gloss finish, and chip resistant when used in conjunction with our Flawless Nail Foundation Basecoat & Hardwear Topcoat. Iconic Covet. Collectible. Classic. The butter LONDON bottle is as fashion-forward as the color collection. Delicate and strong, feminine and sexy, our bottles make a statement in any beauty space. Fade to glitter with an irresistable combination of sophistication and sparkle. Apply Nail Foundation Flawless Basecoat, and then two coats of your favorite butter LONDON lacquer. Let dry. Start from the tip of the nail, and gently drag a matching glitter lacquer down the nail, lifting the brush so it does not fully cover. Let dry. Finish with Hardwear P.D. Quick Topcoat.

productTitle: Filorga Optim-Eyes Eye contour cream³
description:
Filorga optim-eyes is an anti-aging, anti-dark circle and anti-puffiness eye contour. A unique complex reduces the appearance of dark circles and reduce swelling in the lower eyelid. Hyaluronic acid and a trio of draining active ingredients smooth the eye contour for a fresher appearance. Medi-Cosmetique is the first French range of dermo-cosmetic products directly inspired by non-surgical procedures, that combines effectiveness of non-surgical procedures with the pleasure of beauty treatments.


A triple action eye cream to reduce the appearance of dark circles, puffiness and wrinkles in a single step. Dark circles: a [ matrikines + chrysin ] duo to reduce the appearance of dark circles. Puffiness: powerful peptides to visibly diminish eye bags. Wrinkles: a trio of smoothing ingredients enriched with hesperidin to smooth out the appearance of wrinkles in the eye area. Melting and refreshing hydrating texture - can be stored in the refrigerator. 15 ml / 0.51 fl.Oz All filorgas aesthetic expertise in an ultra-smoothing cream to visibly reduce the appearance of all types of wrinkles. Contraction wrinkles: a tripeptide to visually reduce the appearance of wrinkles without freezing facial expressions. Deep-set wrinkles: a powerful peptide combined with encapsulated hyaluronic acid to visibly plump the appearance of deep wrinkles. Surface wrinkles: an exfoliating ingredient to visibly smooth the outer layers of the skin. Dryness wrinkles: a plant extract that captures water to reduce the appearance of dehydration wrinkles. Gel-cream texture. 50ml / 1.69 fl.Oz An intense enhancing mask to illuminate and brighten the complexion, smooth the appearance of wrinkles and visibly reduce the signs of skin fatigue. Formulated with collagen and elastin to hydrate, refresh and smooth the features. Enriched with rhamnose polysaccharide to brighten the complexion and reveal the skins apparent radiance. It also includes a powerful moisturizing ingredient to restore suppleness and softness of the skin. Smooth/rich cream texture for a unique and relaxing experience. Standard 50 ml/1.7 fl.Oz - discovery 30 ml/1 fl.Oz

productTitle: Pureté Thermale Hydrating Foaming Cream Cleanser, 4.2 Fl. Oz.
description:
Amazon is an authorized retailer of Vichy products. Vichy Pureté Thermale Soothing Eye Makeup Remover is an ultra-effective, gentle cleansing solution that completely removes eye make-up without tugging or tightness. Makeup remover’s refreshing water-like texture perfectly cleanses fragile or sensitive skin without tightness or discomfort. Light, refreshing fragrance selected to maximize the sensorial experience. Founded in France in 1931, Vichys formulas combine clinically-proven ingredients with mineral-rich volcanic water to deliver real results to women of all ages. Today, Vichy is the #1 Anti-Aging Brand in European pharmacies.


Everyday our skin is bombarded by environmental aggressors such as pollution and other toxins. In fact, you come in contact with over 700,000 toxins everyday- all of which challenge skin strength and quality. As a result, your skin can look dull and worn-down. That's why it's imperative to wash your face daily with an effective cleanser to remove makeup, dirt, pollutant particles and excess sebum so your skin feels clean, fresh and soothed. Safety is at the heart of the Vichy formulas as there is no compromise made for safety on skin. Vichy Puret Thermale Hydrating Foaming Cream Facial Cleanser is Colorant-free. Allergy Tested. No drying alcohol. Suitable for sensitive skin. Tested under dermatological control for safety. Whats the French secret for beautiful healthy skin? Taking care of your skin's needs with a daily skincare routine is key for healthy-looking skin. A daily cleanser is essential to any skincare routine. The Purete Thermale line offers purposefully pure, dramatically clean, and incredibly gentle cleansers formulated with Mineralizing Thermal Water to cleanse your skin. Now you don't have to be in France, to enjoy the benefits of French skincare.

productTitle: Cole Mankind, 3.4 Fl oz
description: Kenneth Cole launches a new men's fragrance called Mankind that have resulted from the new partnership with Par lux: “The fragrance is meant to speak to that Renaissance guy. He is accomplished but humble, he is strong but sensitive. He’s got a very clear sense of. . . where he is, where he’s going and how he’s going to get there. He’s very much focused on looking good but also doing good. " (wwd) . The fragrance is advertised with cheeky slogans such as “Join the Evolution “and “Your ape will either grow more hunchbacked or erect". The fragrance is developed by Claude Dir as aromatic - woody. Fresh aromatic elements of cardamom, tarragon leaf, ginger and pineapple lead to masculine elements of cedar, vetiver and cinnamon that provide warm sensuality. Then comes the base of sandalwood, oak moss, Tonka bean and skin musk. Chad Lavigne designed the bottle. The fragrance is available as 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Toilette. Mankind was launched in 2013. This product is manufactured in USA. Kenneth Cole has embodied the boldness of New York life. Those who chase their dreams no matter where they live. A true gentleman, he makes an appearance unknowingly and without pretension.  His cool, calm and refreshing confidence are evident in his every move. Fresh notes of pineapple and pear are spiced up with cardamom, tarragon leaves and zesty ginger to always keep things interesting. In his heart lies a strength and character that many notice, but few get to really know reflected with assuring woods and a hint of unexpected cinnamon.  As his personality unfolds one layer at a time, nuances of sandalwood and oakmoss are brushed with a gentle hint of tonka and wrapped in a masculine skin musk. Be the evolution - Mankind. The bold, aromatic fragrance for the modern man, who is defined by his own expectations. Be the evolution -  Mankind . Fresh notes of pineapple and pear are spiced up with cardamom, tarragon leaves and zesty ginger. In his heart of lies a strength of woods and a hint of unexpected cinnamon. Nuances of sandalwood and oak moss are brushed with a gentle hint of tonka and wrapped in a masculine musk.

productTitle: Rose Moisture Plus Moisturising Lotion - 1.7 oz
description:
The Jurlique line is brought to you by a biochemist and botanist duo who have dedicated their careers to creating organically and biodynamically
produced ingredients straight from their farm in the Adelaide Hills of South Australia.
Jurlique Rose Moisture Plus Moisturising Lotion
A little product goes a long way with this fragrant floral elixir for your dry, stressed or simply temporarily unbalanced skin. Using the natural power of
botanicals and the vitamins, antioxidants and even fatty acids produced by related extracts and ingredients, this lotion can both hydrate your skin flawlessly
and provide protection from outside pollution and sun exposure.
Priceless Natural Moisturizer: Rose Oil
The goodness weve extracted from essential rose oil, specifically Rosa damascena and Rosa centifolia, does not come cheaply, as it requires an incredibly high
number (tens of thousands!) of rose petals per ounce of oil. The powerhouse floral scented benefits are worth the work to us and we believe your skin will agree!
Soft Suggestions for Best Results
While individual skin care regimens vary, we recommend applying twice daily (morning and night) to cleansed skin by warming a small amount between your
fingertips and gently blending it in. Its soft enough to use on your face,neck and even neckline.
100% Satisfaction Guarantee
We have a complete satisfaction guarantee that we stand by. If unhappy, please contact us. Our purpose is to inspire people to wellbeing through a connection to nature. We grow, harvest and extract concentrated botanicals at our organic farm in the South Australian hills to create pure and powerful skin care. Our products come from Jurlique's Natural Beauty Plant, a state-of-the-art research and manufacturing facility in the heart of South Australia. We cultivate our iconic botanicals at our Organic Jurlique Farm in the Adelaide Hills of South Australia. We can therefore guarantee the purity and effectiveness of our Organic active ingredients.

GEL POMADE works well as a base, some users mix or cocktail this product along with our CLASSIC POMADE, BLACKTOP POMADE, or FIBER POMADE for precise holds on the sides or to add volume with a light blow dry. GEL POMADE is especially good for finer hair as it will thicken and enhance volume and will also enhance curls if crunched into hair. And again, as in all our finishing products, its water-reactivatable and conveniently rinses out. GEL POMADE is also available in a travel-friendly 2 oz size. IMPERIAL BARBER PRODUCTS set out to evolve the craft of American mens grooming by bringing time-honored grooming traditions into the home via all-natural, utilitarian, premium products. Founded in 2009 by Master Barbers Scott Serrata and Pedro Zermeno, Imperial Barber Products set out to evolve the craft of American mens grooming by bringing time-honored grooming traditions into the home via all-natural, utilitarian, premium products. Today, Imperial Barber Products has become an authority in masculine mens grooming. The team behind Imperial Barber Products have spent a combined 30 years in the Los Angeles, London and New York City barber culture. During that time, they worked to perfect the craft of classic American mens styling. In all those years they never found a hair or grooming product that worked perfectly. Pomades, gels and waxes were too weak, too greasy and waxy, or too fragrant, while shaving products often fell victim to an onslaught of hype that never met expectations. The Imperial team decided to work together to build the perfect products themselves. Purveyors of timeless products rooted in traditional mens grooming, the Imperial team embraces and supports classic American styling. Each product is custom formulated and crafted with performance, utility and function in mind. All products adhere to the same guidelines: Made by barbers. Made to work. Made in the USA.

productTitle: BLACK – Industrial Strength Hand Healer – Hard Working Hand Cream, PureScience Formula, Non-Greasy, Soothe Dry and Chapped Hands, Vitamin A and E, Macadamia Nut Oil, 3 and 16 oz.
description:
Jack Black Industrial Strength Hand Healer is the perfect solution for quick relief for dry, cracked, and chapped hands. This rich, non-greasy PureScience hand cream contains a fast-acting formula that helps repair tough, calloused skin and cuticles, providing lasting relief. Intensive moisturizers and special conditioners help diminish tough calluses and heal unsightly cuticles. The unique formula absorbs for a smooth, dry finish, leaving minimal residue on hands.

Jack Black Industrial Strength Hand Healer is packed with vitamins and other certified organic ingredients that work together to provide relief for dry and rough hands. Vitamin A and vitamin E are powerful antioxidants that act to protect cells against free-radical damage. Liposomes encapsulate the moisturizers and vitamins to deliver maximum, sustained penetration to the skin. Macadamia nut oil penetrates and works below the skins surface to keep it hydrated and soft, while glycerin helps to replenish and maintain the skins moisture balance.

Jack Black PureScience formulas are free of synthetic fragrance, colorants, and parabens. Every product features certified organic ingredients and is always cruelty free and dermatologist tested. Almost all of the products in our line are vegan, free of artificial colorants, safe for sensitive skin, and made in the USA. For best results, apply a small amount of Jack Black Industrial Strength Hand Healer to the palms and backs of your hands any time they feel dry or rough. (As the palms and back of your hands have the fewest and smallest oil glands, they tend to get the driest.) This product is also very effective on rough elbows and feet. If youre looking for a fast-acting and high-quality dry, chapped, cracked hands relief product, add Jack Black Industrial Strength Hand Healer to your daily regimen. By Jack Black An effective antioxidant and can help strengthen the outer layer of skin. Known as an antioxidant superstar, this vitamin works to protect cells against free-radical damage. An extremely high quality oil with an exceptionally small molecule (the smallest of all oils) to penetrate and work below the skins surface to soften and hydrate skin. A humectant which helps replenish and maintain the skins moisture balance.

productTitle: Silksphere Airpod Airbrush Foundation
description: FLAWLESS FINISH </br> Engineered with an advanced smoothing complex, Temptus original SilkSphere Airpod Foundation is made to mimic the appearance of flawless skin. The 4-in-1 formula functions as a primer, foundation, concealer and corrector to deliver professional staying power, cover imperfections and minimize the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and pores. Its dewy, soft-focus finish looks natural and gives your skin the luminous glow you love. </br> </br> NO STREAKS </br> Temptu SilkSphere foundation is designed for use with Temptu Air airbrush makeup machines only. The cordless beauty tool, which is sold separately, transforms the silky smooth foundation into a lightweight, micro-fine mist and seamlessly deposits it onto the skin, instantly blending with blush, highlighter or bronzer. The effortlessly buildable formula allows for sheer, medium or full coverage with no streaks or lines to correct. </br> </br> GENTLE ON SKIN </br> Temptu SilkSphere Airpod airbrush foundation leaves skin looking flawless and feeling healthy. The hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic formula is gentle on skin and even good for it thanks to powerful hydrating and purifying ingredients. There are no fragrances, oil or parabens to worry about, and its weightless feel is perfect for long wear. </br> </br> MULTIPLE SHADES </br> SilkSphere Airpod foundation is suitable for all skin types and available in several shades so you can find the perfect match for your skin tone. These color-correcting pigments help conceal and correct everything from fine lines, blemishes and discoloration to rosacea and acne scars. </br> </br> EASY TO APPLY </br> Temptu airbrush makeup requires use of Temptu Air devices for application. After the Airpod is fitted to the applicator, hold the machine 3 inches from your face and pull lightly on the SoftTouch Control. Move in a circular and build coverage. Remember, less is more with a Temptu Air - you will get more coverage with less makeup. For over 35 years, TEMPTU has revolutionized airbrush makeup & created award-winning formulas to fuel the passion and artistry of professionals and their clientele. At TEMPTU, great things happen where beauty & technology meet.

productTitle: Mr Burberry Eau De Toilette
description: Mr. Burberry. A man of contrasts. Classic yet contemporary; sophisticated and sensual. A sartorial elegance with a rebellious attitude. Authentic and British. London is his home, a city of subtlety and surprise. Like him, it is refined and elegant, not pristine or perfect. An energy and irreverence define their style. Mr. Burberry captures the essence of London and its moments, fusing classic scents of British perfumery with unexpected ingredients. Fresh and crafted top notes of crisp, zesty grapefruit, cut with a seductive base of earthy vetiver and smoky guaiac wood. The bottle is inspired by the iconic black Burberry trench coat, its quality, craftsmanship, style and timeless appeal. Celebrated for its innovative protective qualities and lauded for its versatility and durability. Bold and masculine, the weighted cap references horn-look buttons, while a hand-tied knot in English-woven black gabardine sits around the neck, celebrating the innovative fabric invented by Thomas Burberry more than 100 years ago. British. Effortless. Runway Inspired. That's Burberrys beauty philosophy. The new fragrance for men by Burberry captures the essence of London and its moments, fusing classic scents of British perfumery with unexpected ingredients. Fresh, crafted top notes of crisp zesty grapefruit are cut with a seductive base of earthy vetiver and smoky guaiacwood. The bottle is inspired by the iconic black Burberry trench coatits quality, craftsmanship, style, and timeless appeal. The weighted cap references horn-look buttons, while a hand-tied knot in English-woven gabardine sits around the neck.

productTitle: Gold Lust Repair  Restore Conditioner
description:
Discover the fountain of youth for soft, shiny, ageless hair. Blending time-honored oils and extracts-cypress, argan and maracuja-with our revolutionary bio-restorative complex, this ultra-hydrating conditioner softens and revitalizes, smoothing each cuticle to undo the damage of time and style. Oribe, the eponymous line from one of the most influential hairdressers of all time is specifically tailored to meet the hair needs of the truly glamorous. These are the products of the hair obsessed. - Oribe Signature Complex (Watermelon, Lychee and Edelweiss Flower Extracts) defends hair from oxidative stress, photoaging and the deterioration of natural keratin, all while protecting from the drying, damaging and color-depleting effects of the elements. - Mediterranean Cypress Extract, known in ancient times as a symbol of immortality, deeply moisturizes for long-lasting repair. - Argan Oil adds healthy shine, repairs damage and controls frizz. - Maracuja Oil, derived from Passion Fruit, replenishes and restores hairs natural moisture. - Bio-Restorative Complex, including Plant Collagen, Caffeine, Biotin and Niacinamide, repairs damage by penetrating the root to fortify, deeply nourish and strengthen the cuticle from the inside out while also stimulating scalp circulation and rejuvenating hair follicles. - Strengthening Protein Blend reverses existing damage and reduces split ends. - Bergamot Oil calms overstressed hair by replacing lost nutrients and moisture. - Dermatologist tested. Formulated without parabens, sulfates or sodium chloride. Color and keratin treatment safe. UV protection for hair. Vegan, cruelty-free and gluten-free.

description:
Admittedly, youre still working on perfect behaviour 24/7, but you can tick off a pristine complexion thanks to Gorgeous Cosmetics Base Perfect Liquid Foundation. Great looking skin on tap? You heard right. Dosed with light-diffusing pigments and special silicones, Base Perfect Liquid Foundation delivers that flawless look we all crave by disguising imperfections and fine lines and giving skin a healthy, luminous glow. And hows this for multi-tasking? The formula also contains antioxidant Vitamins A and E, which not only nourish and sooth the skin but also protect it against free radical damage all while youre going about your business. Base Perfect Liquid Foundation boasts an oil-free, medium coverage formula that wont clog pores or leave an embarrassing oil slick come morning latte time. And it stays put. Yep, this foundation promises to stick with you until youre ready to put your feet up (finally) without going cakey, blotchy, or you know, just kind of blah on your skin Call off the search for your perfect match too because Base Perfect Liquid Foundation covers the spectrum of skin tones with fourteen different shades. Gorgeous Cosmetics is a luxury Australian cosmetics brand. Our makeup collection includes high-performance foundations and powders, eye and lip products, premium Pro-quality brushes and reusable false lashes. Inform your doctor if your condition persists. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash or irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. Broad Spectrum SPF 20 Sunscreen

Amazon is an authorized retailer of Vichy products. In 10 days, 10 signs of aging look visibly improved: wrinkles appear reduced; skin looks more luminous and plumped, feels tightened, as if lifted, and feels comfortable. Complexion looks more even; the appearance of dark circles look diminished, skin looks rested and feels moisturized. The lightweight, fast-absorbing facial serum absorbs quickly into skin leaving it feeling smoother, softer and hydrated. Apply a few drops on your fingertips and smooth evenly across the face and neck until thoroughly absorbed. This hyaluronic acid serum can be used alone or under LiftActiv Supreme Day Moisturizer or LiftActiv Night Supreme Moisturizer for a complete anti-aging regimen. Ingredients: Aqua / Rhamnose / Cyclohexasiloxane / Glycerin / Alcohol Denat. / Butylene Glycol / Polymethylsilsesquioxane / Octyldodecanol / Polysilicone-11 / Dimethicone / Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate / Bht / Peg-20 Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate / C13-14 Isoparaffin / Sodium Hyaluronate / Sodium Hydroxide / Adenosine / Poloxamer 338 / Di Sodium Edta / Ammonium Polyacryldimethyltauramide / Tocopherol / Capryloyl Salicylic Acid / Caprylyl Glycol / Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid / Laureth-7 / T-Butyl Alcohol / Polyacrylamide / Parfum / Code Fil: C180572/1. Today, Vichy is the #1 Anti-Aging Brand in European pharmacies.


Vichy's core ingredient integrated in all Vichy products: - Pure: Formed by nature and impossible to reproduce scientifically. - Charged with 15 essential minerals. - Protect skin against daily aggressors. Formulated for safety and efficacy. From the one of the leading brands in European pharmacies, Vichy is trusted by millions of women around the world promising safe, effective, and beautiful formulas for strong, healthy skin.

description:
Amazon is an authorized retailer of La Roche-Posay products Anthelios 60 Sunscreen Spray SPF 60 Ultra-Light Body and Face Sunscreen Lotion, Water Resistant with Cell-Ox Shield Broad Spectrum SPF 60. This La Roche-Posay sunscreen’s features are: Recommended for sunscreen protection for the face and body, broad spectrum SPF 60. Sunscreen has an ultra-light texture, is fast absorbing, and provides a non-greasy finish. This La Roche-Posay sunscreen is developed against stringent safety standards:   A pioneer in UV protection research for over 15 years, La Roche-Posay, with Anthelios, is trusted by dermatologists worldwide for its advanced formulations in UV protection. Shake spray sunscreen well before use. Hold container 4 to 6 inches from the skin to apply. Do not spray directly into face. Spray on hands then apply to face. Reapply sunscreen after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, at least every 2 hours.  Children under 6 months of age: ask a doctor.   Ingredients: Avobenzone 3% (sunscreen), Homosalate 15% (sunscreen), Octisalate 5% (sunscreen), Octocrylene 7% (sunscreen), Oxybenzone 6% (sunscreen) Inactive Ingredients: Dimethicone, Water, Isododecane, Isononyl Isononanoate, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Styrene/acrylates Copolymer, PEG-30 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Trisiloxane, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Sodium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Flycol, PEG-8 Laurate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tocopherol, Disodium EDTA, P-anisic Acid, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Cassia Alata Leaf Extract, Maltodextrin, Propylene Carbonate.

productTitle: Apres Beach Wave and Shine Spray
description:
Attention island-hoppers and champagne-poppers: get beach-to-bombshell hair - tousled, touchable waves with sun-kissed shine - without the salty stiffness. Our moisturizing glamour spray uses rich extracts and exotic oils for lush repair and sultry texture. The oribe shine spray is formulated without parabens or sodium chloride, and is color and keratin treatment safe. The spray protects hair from UV rays, and the specifically designed actuator drives product into hair, to add texture and piece separation. Adds moisture and shine, nourishes and repairs, creatures wavy, touchable, sexy hair, without salty-stiffness. Shake. Spray on wet or dry hair. Tousle to taste and let dry in the St. Tropez air. Follow with lipstick and heels. UV protection for hair. Oribe, the eponymous line from one of the most influential hairdressers of all time is specifically tailored to meet the hair needs of the truly glamorous. These are the products of the hair obsessed. - Oribe Signature Complex (Watermelon, Lychee and Edelweiss Flower Extracts) defends hair from oxidative stress, photoaging and the deterioration of natural keratin, all while protecting from the drying, damaging and color-depleting effects of the elements. - Beach Wave Complex (Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Pro-Vitamin B5, Unique Copolymer, and Amber Extract) swells the hair shaft and creates wavy, piecey texture and light hold. - Blend of Rich Moisturizers, Plant Extracts and Oils (Isohexadecane, Safflower Seed Oil, Marigold Flower Extract, Amber Extract) provide soft, silky, sultry texture and offer antioxidant protection against free-radical damage. - Kaempferia Galanga Root Extract, found in Southeast Asia, imparts natural UV protection. - Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein conditions and renews damaged hair, while adding body and shine.

View larger
View larger
Oribe Hair Care was founded with the goal of creating a new kind of hair company, one that was designed with the most discriminating customers in mind. When developing the line, we didn't want to compromise on any detail. We leveraged skin care technology and natural actives to deliver high-performance, treatment-based products- all while never forgetting that healthy hair is the underpinning for sexy, glamorous styling. Each product has been created to ensure the highest results, leaving us with a best-in-class collection that truly meets the needs of the hair-obsessed.

productTitle: Patou Joy Forever Eau de Parfum Spray
description: JOY Forever is a rich expression of Parisian elegance. A new, modern floral created to express the timeless spirit of JOY today. At the fragrance heart is the Patounade, a Rose de May and Jasmine accord that is exclusive to Jean Patou fragrances. JOY Forever is an emotion that we imagine is eternal, enjoyed by every generation, past, present and future. Hailed as the king of Parisian fashion during the 1920s and 1930s, JEAN PATOU was known as the genius of fashion, modern style and the alchemist of scent. His legacy of Haute Perfumerie includes classis such as JOY and 1000. A fragrant fusion of elegance and opulence. Although renowned for his extraordinary couture designs, JEan Patous true legacy was that of perfume, a domain perfectly suited to his extravagant and demanding temperament. Each fragrance had its own story and was usually linked to a topical event. The classic Joy, 1000 and Sublime fragrances embody Jean Patous characteristic quest for perfection and brings these exquisite perfumes to a new generation of sophisticated women worldwide. For Jean Patou Paris, creating a fragrance is an art and the fragrances reflect this quest for excellence and refinement.

productTitle: Cream - Jurlique Herbal Recovery Night Cream (1.7 oz) - Can Help Fight Fine Lines - Supports Improved Skin Texture and Tone - Packed With Antioxidants and Botanical Extracts
description:
At Jurlique, we believe that when it comes to skin care,health and wellbeing, nature has the ultimate power to create,nurture
and soothe. No manufactured product can ever come close to what nature provides when it comes to truly healthy, beautiful skin.
Jurlique Herbal Recovery Night Cream
A true wonder cream, this night time answer to the need for a moisturizing, age-fighting and environmentally protective solution might
just be the face cream of your dreams. It packs a lot into its 1.7 oz size, including botanical extracts like African Birch and Daisy and
antioxidants like Vitamin E for skin that can see an improvement in tone, elasticity, hydration and so much more.
Extracting Key Ingredients for Better Skin
For skin that both looks and feels better, our (not so secret) ingredients are Moth Bean and African Birch extracts. The Moth Bean extract
can naturally help refine and enhance the texture of skin by promoting an increase in the production of collagen and cellular renewal. The
African Birch Extract can combat the most visible signs of aging, like fine lines and the loss of elasticity while protecting your skin from
free radicals.
The Botanical Magic of Jurlique Farm
Theres something special about the process of handpicking herbs and flowers to be used in our extracts. The Jurlique Farm, located in the
Adelaide Hills of South Australia, is the home of our organically and biodynamically produced ingredients that infuse healing properties
that we believe only nature can provide.
100% Satisfaction Guarantee
If for any reason you dont wake up thrilled with this night cream, contact us so we help. Our purpose is to inspire people to wellbeing through a connection to nature. We grow, harvest and extract concentrated botanicals at our organic farm in the South Australian hills to create pure and powerful skin care.

productTitle: Tensage Soothing Cream Moisturizer, 1 oz.
description:
This non-comedogenic cream is ideal for normal-to-oily skin exhibiting the early signs of aging. Skin irritated by acne medications or following dermatologic procedures can also benefit from its soothing relief. Biopelle is a leader in professional, clinically-proven skincare products that deliver evidence-based, patented technologies that offer new pathways of rejuvenation, treat various skin concerns and deliver remarkable results.


Millions of years ago, the earliest ancestors of a Mediterranean snail, the Cryptomphalus aspersa,emitted a secretion that acted as a defense mechanism to enable their survival as they moved from sea to land. This secretion protected the snail as it encountered new environmental conditions such as extreme temperatures, dryness, humidity and solar radiation for the first time. The secretion that helped ensure the snails' survival still lives on in the modern day Cryptomphalus aspera snail; in fact, scientists observed that the C. aspersa produces a secretion that protects and repairs its skin from burns and injury in under 48 hours. With further study, it was discovered that SCA (the secretion of C. aspersa) contained many of the same growth factors, amino acids, and antioxidants found in human skin. This finding led scientists to harness the restorative properties of the snail secretion for anti-aging skincare benefits. SCA Biorepair Technology, found exclusively in Tensage Growth Factor, helps reverse the visible signs of aging due to external factors such as sun exposure and environmental damage. Further research led scientists to discover that the eggs of the C. aspersa yielded unique stem cell activating properties to help combat intrinsic aging of the skin. Tensage Stem Cell, featuring CellPro Technology, helps to activate the skin's own stem cells to produce new healthy cells and restore a healthy, more youthful-looking appearance.

productTitle: Iceland Nail Lacquer Collection
description: Nail lacquer is the original nail polish formula that reinvented quality nail color, your top choice if you enjoy updating your manicure weekly. Rich, natural brown roots your look in a natural hue. Crme finish provides depth and shine for a superior manicure. Made in the USA. OPI is the #1 salon nail brand worldwide and we believe color brings emotion to life. OPI is known for iconic shades, collections inspired by global destinations and partnerships with pop culture phenoms. Founded in 1981, OPI first established its roots in the professional nail industry, taking the brand to consumers with the launch of 30 groundbreaking Nail Lacquer shades in 1989. With its famous bottle, incredible colors, high-quality product and unique names, OPI revolutionized the nail care industry. In fact, some of these original shades  Alpine Snow, OPI Red, Malaga Wine  became so iconic, they are still sold today! For more than 25 years, OPI has offered users a 'message in a bottle,' creating a worldwide Culture of Color embracing color as a powerful tool for self-expression. This Fall, wander with us into the untouched Icelandic landscape as we introduce a palette inspired by the country's captivating natural wonders. From volcanic formations and lava fields to black sand beaches and glowing geysers, Iceland offers an incredibly vast environment with colors, textures and natural phenomenon unlike any other place on the planet. Step 1: Prep your nails! Remove existing nail lacquer then trim and shape nails by filing in one direction only to prevent breakage! Apply cuticle oil, push back cuticles and remove hangnails. Finally, cleanse to remove oil. Step 2: Apply base coat to prime the nail surface, increase lacquer adhesion and prevent discoloration Step 3: Apply two coats of Nail Lacquer, using three strokes for each coat. Apply the first down the middle and then one on each side for complete coverage. Step 4: Apply top coat over the nail. Dont forget to cap the nails free edge to keep color from chipping. productTitle: Retriderm Serum, 1 fl. oz.
description:
Ideal for sensitive skin or first-time retinol users. Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and deliver firmer, smoother looking skin. Periderm is Retinol (vitamin A) delivered in a protein-rich, oil-free, aqueous suspension allowing for maximum absorption, minimal irritation and visible results. Periderm Serums help to: Deliver softer, smoother skin Diminish the appearance of lines and wrinkles Provide the appearance of thicker, firmer, plumper looking skin Biopelle is a leader in professional, clinically-proven skincare products that deliver evidence-based, patented technologies that offer new pathways of rejuvenation, treat various skin concerns and deliver remarkable results. Retinol (Vitamin A) helps and maintain healthy skin, both through the foods we eat and when topically applied. Known for its wide range of benefits, Retinol has been shown to have powerful restorative and skin rejuvenation properties. When applied topically, Retinol is fundamental to healthy skin and helps to restore radiance, luminosity, and to provide firmer looking skin. Rough areas become softer and, as skin becomes smoother, the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles are diminished. Continued use results in a healthy, more youthful appearance.


Formulated with 0.5% retinol, this serum is ideal for sensitive skin or first time retinol users. This formulation helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and deliver firmer, smoother looking skin. Formulated with 0.75% retinol, this serum is ideal for those with more serious aging skin concerns or those looking to step up from Retriderm Mild. This formulation helps restore skins radiance and provides the appearance of firmer and plumper looking skin. Formulated with the highest strength of retinol, 1%, this serum is ideal for extremely photo damaged skin, those who exhibit a high tolerance to retinoids, or for those looking to step up from Retriderm Plus or Mild. This formulation provides maximum rejuvenation and helps restore radiance, luminosity and firmer looking skin.

productTitle: Nail Files
description: Hardened glass features an everlasting abrasive surface that is permanently etched into the glass. 100% nonporous glass can be sanitized and disinfected between uses. Professionals' Choice! OPI has all your filing needs covered with a unique OPI Professional File collection that offers a disposable file. Founded in 1981, OPI first established its roots in the professional nail industry, taking the brand to consumers with the launch of 30 groundbreaking Nail Lacquer shades in 1989. With its famous bottle, incredible colors, high-quality product and unique names, OPI revolutionized the nail care industry. In fact, some of these original shades  Alpine Snow, OPI Red, Malaga Wine  became so iconic, they are still sold today. For more than 25 years, OPI has offered users a message in a bottle, creating a worldwide Culture of Color embracing color as a powerful tool for self-expression. Step 1: Prep your nails. Remove existing nail lacquer then trim and shape nails by filing in one direction only to prevent breakage. Apply cuticle oil, push back cuticles and remove hangnails. Apply Chip Skip to prep nails for application. Step 2: Apply base coat to increase lacquer adhesion and prevent discoloration. Step 3: Apply two coats of Nail Lacquer, using three strokes for each coat. Apply the first down the middle and then one on each side for complete coverage. Step 4: Apply top coat over the nail. Dont forget to cap the nails free edge to keep color from chipping. To keep hands looking youthful and manicure-ready at a moments notice, nail care is key. Push back cuticles and apply cuticle oil daily to help condition and soften cuticles. Take care to cut only hanging skin as needed. Wash hands with a non-drying soap and regularly apply an ultra-hydrating lotion to keep hands from looking ashy or dry.

productTitle: Glass Water Bottle with Smooth Silicone Sleeve for Travel, Narrow Mouth, BPA-Free  Dishwasher Safe
description:
If you want to know more Increased water intake is key to a clear, radiant, healthy-looking complexion. bur is the solution to staying truly hydrated and drinking more water, helping to create the foundation for a gorgeous complexion so skincare and makeup can perform their best. These glass water bottles are the antidote to disposable plastic bottles and the solution to achieving skin that glows. Increased water intake helps: - Visibly plump skin and increase elasticity for a younger look - Reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles - Make skin more luminous - Flush toxins to rid skin of dirt and unclog pores - Promote even skin tone and texture - Soothe and calm irritated skin - Reduce under-eye dark circles and keep eyes clearer - Keep lips soft, moisturized, and un-chapped - Nourish dry hair and add shine - Make nails stronger and healthier - Reduce the appearance of cellulite and veins Made of pure glass and silicone, bur won't alter the taste of your water and doesn't filter chemicals like plastic. Key features include a small mouth for hassle-free sipping, a soft, colorful silicone sleeve, a dishwasher safe design, and an ergonomic, leak-proof cap. This product is vegan, hypoallergenic, cruelty-free, food safe, formulated without gluten, and made responsibly. bkr is the antidote to disposable plastic bottles, and the key to skin that glows from the inside. Since 2011, bkr has been proving that beauty will change the world, with water bottles so beautiful that drinking from them becomes a joy. Founded by Tal Winter and Kate Cutler, bkr is the antidote to cheap, disposable plastic bottles, and the key to skin that glows from the inside. These notoriously addictive glass water bottles feature signature small mouths, and silicone sleeves inspired from everything from fashion to photography to contemporary culture and fine art. Each bkr breathes new life into the maxim of eight glasses a day, inspiring sippers to drink water like it's a special treat and helping create the foundation for gorgeous complexion so skincare and makeup can do their work. Dishwasher: You can clean your bkr by running it through the dishwasher top rack. The sleeve is dishwasher safe and does not need to be removed, but its easy to slip on and off if you want to. By hand: If youre cleaning your bkr by hand, we recommend using hot soapy water and our bottle brush especially if you are drinking more than plain water. If youd like to speed up the drying process, roll up a piece of paper towel so its thin enough to get in the opening of the bottle, but wide enough to stay put. Put the roll 3/4 the way down the bottle (with the top of the roll out the top of the bottle, like a wick) and leave it overnight. We recommend storing your bkr with the cap off.


1L 32 OZ 2X/Day For: When youre thirsty. On your bedside table, at your desk, by your side when working out. 500 ML 16 OZ 4X/ Day For : Everyday drinking in the car, in your bag, on you always. 250 ML 8 OZ 8X/ Day For : A full glass of water on the go. For beauty elixirs, wellness tonics, for your little ones, in your ultra-cute handbag.
