productTitle: Professional Teeth Whitening Toothpaste  Recommended By Cosmetic Dentists, CLINICALLY...
description: Created by Dr. Irwin Smigel, world-renowned "Father of Aesthetic Dentistry". Contains the unprecedented science behind supersmile, Calprox, a proprietary formula of encapsulated calcium peroxide and minerals. Calprox gently and effectively removes the sticky bio-film from teeth, to which plaque, bacteria, and stains adhere, without the risk of sensitivity. Clinically shown to whiten teeth up to 6 shades when used with the Professional Whitening Accelerator*. Inhibits plaque 10X better than leading plaque-removing toothpastes*. 75% less abrasive than the limit set by the ADA*. Best-selling formula safely and effectively lifts surface stains such as coffee, tea, tobacco and red wine without harsh abrasives. Contains calcium, magnesium, phosphates, and fluoride which remineralize and restore enamel and fight cavities. Restores bonded teeth, veneers, caps, dentures to their original shade. Just brush and whiten. Free of silica, parabens, sulfates, known allergens, animal by-products and BPA. It's also Kosher Hailed as the "#1 Whitening System" recommended by cosmetic dentists, Supersmile is world-renowned for its unparalleled ability to safely whiten while also cleaning, protecting, and strengthening teeth. Since revolutionizing the industry, Dr. Irwin Smigel and Supersmile has been at the forefront of every major innovation in dentistry, earning Dr. Smigel a permanent exhibition of his achievements in the National Museum of Dentistry. Acknowledged by the New York University College of Dentistry and celebrated by peers internationally as the "Father of Aesthetic Dentistry", Dr. Irwin Smigel is the founder and former president of the American Society for Dental Aesthetics, diplomat of the American Board of Aesthetic Dentistry, and the creator and international spokesperson for Supersmile. Frequently Asked Questions Q: What is Calprox? Calprox is the unprecedented science behind Supersmile; a proprietary technology of encapsulated calcium peroxide with other minerals. Calprox works by gently and effectively dissolving the sticky bio-film from your teeth to which plaque, bacteria and stains (such as coffee, tea, tobacco, red wine and anything that will stain a white shirt) adhere. By dissolving the bio-film, Calprox removes stains and remineralizes enamel without the risk of sensitivity. This proprietary formula leaves the teeth whiter, feeling cleaner and healthier. Q: Is Calprox safe on dental work? Studies have proven that Calprox is as safe as water on your dental work. Many toothpastes use silica (an abrasive sand-like material) to whiten teeth by scratching away surface stains. Because silica is highly abrasive, over time it can thin the enamel. Thin enamel causes sensitivity and may lead to more serious oral problems as well as causing the teeth to look yellow. Calprox allows for safe whitening with no risk of sensitivity. Calprox contains minerals such as calcium, magnesium, and phosphates, and when combined with fluoride it remineralizes and restores enamel. Calprox is found in almost all supersmile products. We are proudly free of silica, parabens, sulfates, known allergens, animal by-products, triclosan, microbeads, polyethylene, and BPA. Q: Will Supersmile products work on all types of teeth? Supersmile will work on all types of teeth including natural teeth, veneers, crowns, bonding and even dentures. Supersmile is also great to use with orthodontic work such as braces or Invisalign. Q: Can I eat right after I finish brushing? Yes, you can eat right after brushing. To get rid of daily build-up, make sure that the last thing you do before going to bed is to brush your teeth. Q: Why does the Whitening Toothpaste have to go on a dry toothbrush? Our Whitening Toothpaste is best used on a dry toothbrush as our Calprox formula reacts with water, and ideally, that reaction begins with the saliva in your mouth and not water on the toothbrush. Q: What is the recommended time used for brushing? We recommend that you brush your teeth for at least 2 minutes in the morning and 2 minutes at night right before going to bed. It is extremely important to brush at night, because, during the day, we swallow 20,000 times (as we drink and talk, we contribute to the quantity of saliva our mouths produce). At night, however, we only swallow about 20 times, allowing plaque and bacteria to form uninterrupted. If plaque remains on your teeth for a few hours, it turns bacterial thus contributing to plaque buildup and morning breath. Q: What is the advantage of using Supersmile products as opposed to other whitening products? Supersmiles Professional Whitening Toothpaste is recommended by cosmetic dentists worldwide. Clinically proven to whiten teeth 4 shades, and 6 shades when used with Supersmile's Whitening Accelerator. Supersmile Professional Whitening Toothpaste remineralizes teeth with calcium, magnesium, phosphates, and fluoride to restore enamel and fight cavities. Simply put, it is the most convenient and healthy way to powerfully whiten teeth without sensitivity no messy strips, trays or changes to lifestyle and you can continue to enjoy all your favorite food and beverages. It also uniquely works very well to restore all dental restorations to their original shade, including bonded teeth, veneers, caps, and dentures. No harsh sensitivity-causing bleaches that dehydrate enamel. Free of SLS, parabens, known allergens, animal by-products, and BPA.*** Q: How long will it take to see results? Some people may see results after just one brushing, for some it will take a little longer, but most people will see results in a few days of use as directed. This process is a continuous one. Please remember that there are a lot of factors that go into how long the process takes, such as age, medication, eating habits, dental work, etc. In addition, it depends on the stains: how long they have been there and how deeply rooted they are in the enamel. Positive results will vary. However, you do not have to change any of your eating habits, eat/drink as usual, continuous brushing will continue to remove stains and whiten.

Award-winning, customer-favorite hair styling product for men, Baxter of California Clay Pomade separates, defines with a matte finish and molds hair in place to deliver a strong, pliable hold that lasts all day. Infused with natural ingredients such as clay and beeswax, texturizing clay pomade works for any hair type whether it be straight or wavy hair, curly or frizzy hair, or hair in a category of its own. productTitle: Shave Cream, 4 oz.
description:
eShave Shaving Cream lathers instantly, delivering essential conditioning ingredients to prime the skin for shaving. The rich, thick, warm lather helps soften the hair, open the pores and prepare the skin for shaving, virtually eliminating shaving irritation for a close, comfortable shave every time. Apply with a badger hair shaving brush or with your fingers for a luscious lather and let your razor glide. eShave Shaving Creams are paraben and sulfate free, they contain no SLS, no SLES, no animal ingredients and no synthetic colors. eShave Shaving Cream will leave skin moisturized and silky smooth. eShave Shaving Cream White Tea With this simple believe, eShave was born. It all started in 1996 when Danielle Malka met with famous barbers in London. They picked her curiosity when talking with such enthusiasm about their clients shaving experience; nothing that compared with her husbands nor any man she knew. With them she captured the essence of wet shaving and developed the 3 steps of shaving program to bring the barbers experience home to every man and created Shave as a shaving solution to all men shaving issues. eShave is still today a unique modern brand that appeals to today men with signature scents, light textures, clean and high quality ingredients. It was the first shaving brand to offer shaving products that were Vegan, eShave has been recognized around the word as one of the best shaving product line and have won many awards throughout the years.


Shave after the shower or use a hot towel: The hot water loosens up pores and softens the hair for a closer shave. Lightly rub eShave Pre Shave Oil onto skin to provide protection and allow the razor to glide easily. Lather up a dab of Shaving Cream with a brush or your fingers to soften and raise the hair away from the skin for a closer shave. Shave with the grain using your eShave Razor. Forget pressure. Change blade often and let it glide over prepared skin in the direction of hair growth. For stubborn hair, reapply Shaving Cream and repeat shaving in a sideways motion using small strokes to prevent irritation. Around the neck area, where hair grows in different directions, run fingers along neck to feel and follow the pattern. Rinse and rub moistened eShave Alum Block against the skin to close the pores and cleanse the skin. Pat skin dry and apply eShave After Shave Soother for maximum comfort.

Alternatively, OPI Matte Top Coat takes nails to a new dimension, offering a high-fashion matte finish to wear over any OPI shade.

Revolutionary, science-based skincare specifically designed for your babys skincare needs from birth on. Mustela researchers have discovered that there is not one, but different types of baby skin. productTitle: Shaving Soap in a Bowl, Refreshing and Toning, 5.2 oz
description: Proraso Shaving Soap, Refreshing and Toning formula, is formulated for any skin or beard type and provides a rich, creamy lather to prepare skin for a close shave without nicks and cuts. Eucalyptus purifies and tones while menthol adds a refreshing, cooling sensation. Made with a special "hot soap" process, it's left to mature in small batches for 10 days, during which the moisture evaporates, and the product becomes solid and more concentrated -- perfect for a professional-quality shave with a brush. Cruelty-free, with 91% of ingredients of natural origins, and of course, theres no parabens, phthalates, silicones, mineral oils, artificial colors or sodium laurel sulfate. Originating in Italy, Proraso has been helping men achieve a smooth shave since 1948. Over the years, our line of men's shaving products has become a staple of Italian culture, and evolved to feature natural-based formulations without mineral oils or artificial colors. Nourishing botanical extracts and natural oils protect the skin before, during and after shaving for an irritation-free experience. You'll notice that our soap may take a bit more water than you're used to, in order to achieve the ideal lather. That's actually one of our biggest points of difference -- the result of its manufacturing process -- and what makes Proraso soap so special. Because it has a much lower moisture content than other shave soaps, youll need more water on your shaving brush (we'd suggest soaking it for a few minutes prior to lathering), and perhaps just a touch more patience at first, to achieve that signature Proraso lather: rich, dense, elastic, and one that doesnt dry out. Once you do, youll really see the difference (and why its become such a staple of shaving culture over the last 6 decades).

productTitle: Anti Residue Hair Cleanse: Gentle pH Balanced Daily Hair Cleansing Conditioning Wash, 10 oz
description:
GENTLE CLEANSING -- Break the cycle of shampoo, rinse and repeat with Unwash Anti-Residue Cleanse. Our gentle pH balanced formula with coconut oil extracts powerfully cleans your hair, turning weighed down strands into weightless, gorgeous shine. -- --PROTECTS -- Infused with Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, your Anti-Residue Cleanse protects and seals natural oils for soft, manageable hair. Moringa Oil moisturizes down to the scalp, enriching each root and hair follicle with rejuvenating vitamins and minerals to produce healthy fullness and damage-resistant resilience. -- -- MOISTURIZES -- Restore the proper moisture to your hair. Along with Coconut Oil, Babassu Oil cleanses, moisturizes, and hydrates your hair back to manageable, lightweight health. Each wash repairs and softens hair for less breakage and smoother ends. -- -- NO HARSH CHEMICALS -- Weve carefully selected each ingredient to repair, restore, and promote youthful shine from root to end. That means leaving out all harsh chemicals. With its fresh, clean fragrance, it invigorates the senses while leaving your skin lightly scented. Use Crepe Erase's Exfoliating Body Polish any time of year for youthful skin, but especially in the harsh winter months. Cold weather can dry out your skin, leaving it cracked, rough, chapped, and flaky. By using this body polish and Crepe Erase’s other products, you can hydrate your skin and prevent excessive dryness, keeping skin softer, smoother, and younger looking. The Exfoliating Body Polish's concentrated moisturizers are the perfect way to combat dry seasonal skin. To use, start with damp skin and apply a pearl-sized amount of Exfoliating Body Polish onto affected areas such as the neck, chest, arms, or legs. Massage in circular motions to help remove dead surface cells. Rinse with warm water and pat dry. Use daily. productTitle: ICELAND Glacial Face Wash

Is your skin depleted, congested and irritated from a high-octane, 24/7 lifestyle? Pamper it skyn Iceland's glacial face wash (mini); refreshing, soothing cleanser that will leave your skin feeling squeaky clean. Creamy, foaming cleanser to refresh, soothe and purify stressed skin. Harmony, balance and glow are restored. Glacial face wash helps relieve bumps, breakouts and irritation due to stress-related increases in hormone levels and oil production. Formulated with the purest Icelandic glacial waters and beneficial botanicals, this creamy, foaming cleanser is exceedingly mild, so it detoxifies and purifies without stripping skin of its natural moisture. Skin's harmony, balance and glow are restored. Skyn ICELAND was born from a life-changing mission to treat and alleviate the effects of stress on skin while promoting a stress-free life full of balance, health and wellness.


After cleansing in the morning, follow with the Antidote Cooling Daily Lotion, a lightweight daily moisturizing lotion that hydrates and cools stressed skin. After moisturizing, follow with the Icelandic Relief Eye Cream, triple-acting eye cream formulated with a breakthrough technology to combat three major eye issues: dark circles, puffiness and wrinkles. After cleansing at night, apply Oxygen Infusion Night Cream, an advanced peptide-packed night cream designed to transform depleted skin on the verge of a nervous breakdown back to a brighter, glowing, more youth-full looking state overnight.

productTitle: Nail Polish Genesis
description:
Founded in 1986, Zoya focuses on high quality products for professional salons and spas. Zoya Nail Polish was the first to create a Big 3 free formula, placing an emphasis on the health and well-being of their clients.


Snow White by Zoya can be best described as a pure white creme that's as clean and bright as freshly-fallen snow. Sparkle Gloss Topcoat by Zoya can be best described as a sheer, glittery topcoat that has the sparkle of diamonds. Leia by Zoya can be best described as a sheer, opalescent white with flecks of fuchsia, green and gold.


Ginessa by Zoya can be best described as a soft, pearly white glitter in a semi-sheer white base. Trixie by Zoya can be best described as a stunning light silver with a sparkling metallic foil finish. Dove by Zoya can be best described as a soft, delicate light neutral gray with an opaque, glossy creme finish.


Zoya Remove Plus is an award wining, gentle, yet highly effective 3-in-1 nail polish remover, nail prep and nail conditioner. Clean and prep nails while moisturizing, nourishing and fortifying the nail plate for guaranteed extended polish wear. Naked Manicure Naked Base is a nutrient rich formula specifically created to refine the nail surface and to treat damage with a proprietary blend of vitamins, proteins, botanicals and sulfur amino acids that mimic the natural keratin structure of the nail. Supports cellular renewal, oxygenation and hydration improving both flexibility and strength. The Naked Manicure Glossy Seal is an additional classic finish option for those who prefer a high shine manicure.

productTitle: Disappearing Ink Concealer 4-in-1 Concealer Pen, 0.12 Fluid Ounce
description:
Finally, there's a foundation primer for irritable, breakout-prone skin! Hydrate & Balance is an oil-free, silicone-free primer that helps provide 72 hours of deep hydration to the skin while providing a mattified makeup look free of the appearance of blemishes. Provides texture plumping hydration that softens the look of lines. Lighten up dark spots and uneven skin tone with botanical extracts from Waltheria leaves and Vitamin B3. Formulated free of petroleum-based oils to gently nourish skin without clogging pores. Contains ingredients such as Salicylic Acid to help unclog pores and treat hidden bacteria. Aloe Vera helps speed up recovery and soothes irritated skin. Our proprietary Ceretin Complex combines age-defying Retinol and super hydrating ceramides to smooth lines and wrinkles. Our products and 100% cruelty-free, and we never test on animals. We understand that a vegan diet is a lifestyle choice so we make products that are void of animal products to fit your lifestyle. For those with severe gluten sensitivities or Dermatitis Herpetiformis, rest assured this product is gluten free! This product and its container are free of Bispehnol A (BPA). At PR, we believe that innovative beauty shouldn't be a burden on anyone. That's why we've been committed to creating cruelty-free products from the start. All of our makeup and skincare products are free of animal testing. Disappearing Ink 4-in-1 Face Concealer Pen quickly brightens the appearance of dark circles, blurs the look of blemishes and wakes up tired-looking eyes.
  • Packed with concentrated skincare ingredients, including Ceretin Complex and a unique 'Diamond Complex' that reflects light away from imperfections
  • Soft-focus microspheres diffuse light to dramatically reduce the appearance of dark circles and under eye imperfections
To Conceal: Apply Disappearing Inkconcealer in an upside down triangle shape under the eyes. Use theSkin Perfecting Concealer Brushto blend for a flawless finish. To Highlight: Apply Disappearing Ink concealer one to two shades lighter than complexion under the eyes, down the bridge of the nose and in the center of the forehead to add depth and definition to your natural features.

She began integrating anti-aging ingredients, triple-milled pigments, fabulous scents...and theBalm was born. Fast forward eleven years, you can now find theBalm's Paraben and Cruelty-Free products worldwide.

description:
A lightweight lotion for normal to oily skin that exfoliates the top layer of the skin, removing dull, old skin and revealing a brighter complexion. *Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. productTitle: SD Advanced Intensive Concentrate for Wrinkles and Stretch Marks
description:
Formulated with Collagex-CE Wrinkle Repair Complex, this hydrating moisturizer harnesses the latest advances in skincare science to target Collagen III, also known as youth collagen, for even more powerful anti-aging results. A series of scientifically-designed studies proves the following effects: Significantly reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles; Targets youth collagen and elastin for healthy, younger looking skin; Hydrates and visibly enhances skin texture; Strengthens the skin barrier to maximize skin performance. SD Advanced goes beyond wrinkles to help transform the look of stretch marks, too.


View larger
Humans have 15 distinct facial expressions that telegraph joy, sadness, worry, surprise and more. But the smiles, smirks and frowns of today become wrinkles of tomorrow. SD Advanced targets these 15 ways to make lines and creases by reducing the appearance of wrinkles in just 15 days. You don't have to wait a month to see results. SD Advanced Intensive Concentrate delivers results in just 15 days. Mark your calendars. *Based on instrumentation & consumer evaluation results in an independent clinical study in September of 2013 on 34 women after 2 weeks of twice daily use. Our products are measured, graded and confirmed by research - and deliver real, visible results. **After 4 weeks of twice daily use, when used as directed. Unretouched photos. Conducted as a part of an independent clinical study in September of 2013 on 34 women.


The Anti-Wrinkle Collection is the cornerstone of StriVectin, home of clinically researched formulas that set the standard for decades of skincare products. Built to address wrinkle causing culprits, Anti-Wrinkle creams, concentrates, serums and masks target collagen levels and strengthens the skin barrier to visibly diminish lines and wrinkles while keeping skin optimized, healthy-looking. Apply SD Advanced all-over to a clean face, avoiding the eye area. Use it morning and night, gently massaging into wrinkle-prone areas. For stretch marks, apply morning and night on clean skin, massaging into targeted areas. Every StriVectin formula is powered by NIA-114, an optimized, patented form of Niacin / Vitamin B3 clinically-proven to strengthen the moisture barrier and supercharge the performance of other ingredients. A high-functioning skin barrier protects skin from damaging environmental aggressors, inhibits moisture loss and is the key to maintaining strong, radiant, healthy-looking skin.

productTitle: Haute Mess Texture Gel
description:
Texture, Volume, Hold. amika Haute Mess Texture Gel amplifies texture for a voluminous, model-off-duty look with a firm hold and dry finish. A special blend of copolymers, Grapefruit and Honey combine to create the precise amount of mess. Sweet Defense. Packed with nutrients, grapefruit fights free radical damage and promotes healthier hair. Plumping power. Honey increases hairs fullness, moisture and softness by pulling water from the environment and plumping tresses. amika is hair rebellion against conformity & the mundane. Founded by industry OUTSIDERS in Williamsburg, Brooklyn in 2007 amika is the antithesis of a typical beauty brand. amika products are like a good friend straightforward, dependable, and fun to spend time with. We are kind-of obsessed with this 'super-fruit' Sea Buckthorn Berry (also known as Obliphica), so we include it in every haircare and styling product. Sea Buckthorn contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including Vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), Vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and Vitamin E. It also has high concentrations of the rare Omega-7, making up 40% of the berry. Typically only found in fish oil, Omega-7 keeps free radicals at bay and promotes the production of collagen, a key building block for skin, hair and nails.


For stay-all-day style that youll still be able to run your fingers through. Effortlessly achieve sleek style. Fusing the convenience of a brush paired with the performance of a styler, Polished Perfection instantly creates smooth hair in a single stroke. For instant volume and perfectly-imperfect texture, this spray is sexy-in-a-bottle. amika was founded by industry Outsiders in Williamsburg, Brooklyn in 2007 and is the antithesis of a typical beauty brand. Instead of purveying unattainable perfection we believe in an idiosyncratic and totally individual version of beauty. The result is a culture of inclusion and positivity, all while delivering puddles of fun and a sunny disposition from looking at our packaging.

Solingen is called the "city of blades", since it has long been renowned for the manufacturing of fine swords, knives, scissors and razors made by famous firms such as DOVO Solingen. productTitle: Hyaluronic Cream, 1.69 Fl Oz
description:
Thalgo Hyaluronic Cream is a comfortable cream for daily use which smooths and fills wrinkles. By fighting against visible wrinkles, this fine yet comfortable cream prolongs a youthful-looking skin. The skin is filled and smoothed in-depth. This is a comfortable cream texture with a floral and fruity fragrance. Founded in 1964, THALGO innovation led by science and marine research, has become a world leader in the spa industry. THALGO Hyaluronic Marine is an anti-aging range of highly concentrated in Hyaluronic Acid, that appears to helps fill and correct established wrinkles. The skin appears youthful, smoother and complexion is radiant. Benefits: Smooth, Fill, Plump


A true key to youthfulness, Marine Hyaluronic Acid appears to extends the skins youthfulness by 'pushing out' established wrinkles. Thalgo Hyaluronic Cream is a comfortable cream for daily use which appears to smooth and fill wrinkles. This fine yet comfortable cream appears to prolong a youthful-looking skin. The skin seems filled and smoothed in-depth. This is a comfortable cream texture with a floral and fruity fragrance. pH 5.65 Apply Thalgo Hyaluronic Cream morning and evening on the face and neck. Combine several times a year with an intensive treatment with Thalgo Hyaluronic Filler.


Hyaluronic Acid has the ability to retain up to 1,000 times its weight in water, it fills and visibly reduces wrinkles by plumping up with water. Hyaluronic Acid is a carbohydrate molecule that is naturally occurring in our bodies and provides lubrication to the connective tissues of our joints and skin. This is an important part of skin's overall health. Exo-Polysaccharides, derived from Kopara Polynesian lagoons, stimulate endogenous synthesis of hyaluronic acid, so that the skin creates its own youth molecules and lastingly helps correct pronounced wrinkles. Matrixyl 6 are peptide produced from derivatives of the amino acids lysine and methione sulfone (the latter is synthetic). Palmitoyl tripeptide-38 is a matrikine-mimetic compound that regulates cell activity, wound repair and collagen tissue remodeling. THALGO has been committed to caring for the Oceans seabed. We ensure that we harvest our algae responsibly (control of the reproductive cycles, satellite surveillance), to preserve the immense reservoir of life represented by the Oceans.

It all started in 1996 when Danielle Malka met with famous barbers in London. They picked her curiosity when talking with such enthusiasm about their clients shaving experience; nothing that compared with her husbands nor any man she knew. With them she captured the essence of wet shaving and developed the 3 steps of shaving program to bring the barbers experience home to every man and created Shave as a shaving solution to all men shaving issues. eShave is still today a unique modern brand that appeals to today men with signature scents, light textures, clean and high quality ingredients.


Shave after the shower or use a hot towel: The hot water loosens up pores and softens the hair for a closer shave. Lightly rub eShave Pre Shave Oil onto skin to provide protection and allow the razor to glide easily. Lather up a dab of Shaving Cream with a brush or your fingers to soften and raise the hair away from the skin for a closer shave. Shave with the grain using your eShave Razor. Forget pressure. Change blade often and let it glide over prepared skin in the direction of hair growth. For stubborn hair, reapply Shaving Cream and repeat shaving in a sideways motion using small strokes to prevent irritation. Around the neck area, where hair grows in different directions, run fingers along neck to feel and follow the pattern. Rinse and rub moistened eShave Alum Block against the skin to close the pores and cleanse the skin. Pat skin dry and apply eShave After Shave Soother for maximum comfort.

Think of your skin as a brick wall. Surface skin cells are the bricks which are surrounded by a naturally occurring intercellular glue (cement). Glycolic Acid found in Transport travels in between our skin cells and breaks down the intercellular glue to accelerate our skins own shedding process. This sophisticated exfoliation speeds up this process to not only reveal healthier, fresher skin cells, but to assist in removing damaged and darkened ones too. Transport, powered by MDT5 features saturated soft cotton pads designed to help improve skin tone, texture and clarity, and an 8% buffered AHA to gently exfoliate dead cells on the skin's surface. Carter by Zoya can be best described as a royal purple with a strong magenta sparkling, matte and textured finish. Noir by Zoya can be best described as deep, vampy plum textured PixieDust with red Mega Hex particles. Arianna by Zoya can be best described as a blue-toned red wine textured PixieDust with Mega Hex particles.


Linds by Zoya can be best described as a cherry red, textured PixieDust with red and fuchsia glitter to mimic the look of maraschino cherries dipped in sugar! Miranda by Zoya can be best described as a rose sparkle in the exclusive Zoya PixieDust Textured, Matte, Sparkle formula. Arabella by Zoya can be best described as a rich fuchsia pink in a matte, textured, sparkling finish.


Zoya Remove Plus is an award wining, gentle, yet highly effective 3-in-1 nail polish remover, nail prep and nail conditioner. Clean and prep nails while moisturizing, nourishing and fortifying the nail plate for guaranteed extended polish wear. Naked Manicure Naked Base is a nutrient rich formula specifically created to refine the nail surface and to treat damage with a proprietary blend of vitamins, proteins, botanicals and sulfur amino acids that mimic the natural keratin structure of the nail. Supports cellular renewal, oxygenation and hydration improving both flexibility and strength. The Naked Manicure Glossy Seal is an additional classic finish option for those who prefer a high shine manicure.

productTitle: Conditioner for Beautiful Color
description:
Have you chemically treated your hair too much, try this Oribe conditioner for beautiful hair. It will help restore color treated hair to its original shine and keep protecting from harmful UV rays. Formulated without parabens or sodium chloride. Color and keratin treatment safe. UV protection for hair. Oribe, the eponymous line from one of the most influential hairdressers of all time is specifically tailored to meet the hair needs of the truly glamorous. These are the products of the hair obsessed. - Oribe Signature Complex (Watermelon, Lychee and Edelweiss Flower Extracts) Defends hair from oxidative stress, photoaging and the deterioration of natural keratin, all while protecting from the drying, damaging and color-depleting effects of the elements. - Honey-derived humectants deliver optimum thermal and chemical dye protection. - A Unique Blend of High-Tech, Light-Weight Silicones protects dyed hair against UV fading and damage. - Edelweiss Flower Extract, from the Swiss Alps, provides natural protection against the drying, damaging and color-depleting effects of the elements. - Kaempferia Galanga Root Extract, found in Southeast Asia, delivers natural UV protection. - Watermelon Extract, from the Kalahari Desert, provides natural protection against oxidative stress and the deterioration of keratin. - Multilayered UV Protection System delivers long-lasting UV protection and guards hair from the harmful effects of the sun. - Formulated without parabens or sodium chloride. Color and keratin treatment safe. UV protection for hair.

productTitle: Restorative Nighttime Bio-Therapy
description:
Replenix Restorative Nighttime Bio-Therapy night cream is a moisture-boosting, decadently rich face cream that nourishes dry skin back to optimum health. 

  • Ceramides provide nourishment to help repair the skin barrier, improving elasticity and texture
  • Peptides complement the skin’s nightly renewal functions and target wrinkles
  • Stem Cells promote softness, firmness and elasticity
  • Antioxidants combat environmental damage and soothe the skin
  • Humectants improve and promote hydration
  • Emollients soften skin and help prevent dryness

Replenix Restorative Nighttime Bio-Therapy night cream rejuvenates a dull, devitalized complexion while you sleep. A unique combination of ceramides, humectants and emollients help attract, retain and distribute moisture to fortify skin's protective barrier and combat dryness. Stem cells derived from apples and peptides help repair damage and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. productTitle: Travel Shaving Brush
description:
Whips shaving cream or shaving soap into a copious lather. Synthetic bristles lift beard off of skin, to allow for the closest shave. Aluminum handle. Wet brush with warm water, put shaving product in palm of hand, and stir to create a rich, generous lather. The synthetic bristles will lift each hair on the face, allowing a closer shave. After use, rinse the brush with warm (not hot) water, shake the excess liquid from the brush and then let the brush dry in an inverted position with the hair of the brush downward. On your next business trip or family vacation, L'Occitane's Travel Shaving Brush will allow you to enjoy the pleasure of a traditional shave. The brush whips shaving products into a copious lather, and its synthetic bristles lift your beard off your skin, allowing for the closest shave possible. Designed especially for travel, the brush head fits into the compact handle, and the lid snaps shut to protect your brush and your baggage during transport.

Designed for Easy Travel and Superior Performance
Constructed from lightweight but durable aluminum, the brush weighs less than one ounce. The brush head snaps into the handle for compact portability, allowing you to easily fit it into any suitcase or dopp kit, and a perforated lid secures the brush head inside the handle, protecting your brush and your baggage while still allowing for air circulation around the brush hairs. Designed with more than just travel in mind, this brush will hold its own against any standard-size luxury shaving brush. The synthetic bristles effortlessly whip shaving cream or shaving soap into a luxurious lather, soften your facial hair, and lift your beard off your skin for the closest possible shave. Like all L'Occitane products, the Travel Shaving Brush is a culmination of tradition and research. The brush has been designed to give you a pleasurable sensory experience and has been rigorously tested under dermatological and medical supervision to ensure the optimum safety and effectiveness that only a genuine L'Occitane brush can bring to a shave. L'Occitane's Commitment to Social Responsibility and the Environment
L'Occitane is committed to limiting its environmental impact, improving the well-being of both its customers and employees, and supporting the social causes close to its heart. From the very beginning, L'Occitane has been a socially responsible company, initiating sustainable development programs, introducing Braille labeling on its packaging, supporting projects led by women in developing societies, championing for people with sensory disabilities, and preserving threatened traditional cultivations, especially those of Provence, France. A company with deep roots in the Provencal soil, L'Occitane is also committed to environmental preservation. As a producer of luxury skin care and body care products, L'Occitane uses natural, controlled-origin, organic, local, and sustainable ingredients, and its products have never been tested on animals. Conserving resources wherever possible, the company recycles its waste, limits its energy consumption, and uses recycled or recyclable materials. L'Occitane also uses paper, cardboard, and wood from sustainable forests and limits the use of packaging material.
About L'Occitane: The Provencal Art of Life
For over thirty years, the fields of Provence and the traditions and techniques of that land have been the secret and inspiration behind L'Occitane products, all of which are developed and produced in the small Provencal town of Manosque. L'Occitane has drawn inspiration from the art de vivre of its birthplace and from traditional Provencal techniques to create products devoted to well-being and the pleasure of taking care of oneself. From texture to design, L'Occitane products always offer sensory delight, so every minute spent with L'Occitane is a moment of indulgence, rich in enjoyment and discovery. What's in the Box
One travel shaving brush.
